summary: Simple replacement for the level up sound effect.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][size=20pt][color=red]Level Up Sound Effect Replacer[/color][/size][/center][/b]

Not much needs to be said about this. It\'s just a simple replacement for the sound effect you hear when leveling up. The original is just so loud and obnoxious, and I wanted something a little more subtle. This is what I came up with.

A preview can be heard here:
[b][url=http://soundcloud.com/animositisomina/skyrim-level-up-sound-effect]Skyrim Level Up Sound Effect Replacement[/url][/b]

******
Installation: Simply extract the Sound folder into your \\Data\\ folder, overwrite if asked. That\'s all there is to it.
author: Animositisomina
